modName: Skyrim Weapon and Apparel Database and Tracker
summary: Searchable and editable database of Weapons and Apparel in Skyrim along with the ability to track items the player has found. As at this version
descriptionHtml:
Updated Version 1.03

Added a few missing items and deleted a few duplicates
Added ability to track up to 5 different games / profiles
Added Item ID\'s
____________________________________________________

When it comes to single player RPG\'s I am, among other things, a total kleptomaniac. Many players will immediately abandon the trusty Orcish Sword of Embers that has served them so well when they finally find a Daedric Sword or quickly don their new Elven Helmet and toss aside the old Steel one without a second thought - not I. I collect, sure I wear the best gear possible but the old gear, I store it [my wife would say \"what\'s new?\" you do that in real life but that\'s a thought for another day] and I record it and I look for the things I don\'t own - kind of like a virtual stamp collector - the purpose of having the items is to have the collection - to get more - to get complete sets - owning is happiness.

The Skyrim Apparel & Weapon Tracker is basically a database [in Excel] of Weapons and Apparel - it currently lists 4725 items from the vanilla game and features the following:

•	Record for each item contains:
•	Name, Source, Class, Category, Type, Rating, \"Owned\" Flag, \"Favorite\" Flag, Storage Location, Enchantment, Notes
•	All records are editable and there is a find function that allows them to be quickly located for reference or editing
•	New items can be easily added accomodating a growing database as new items are added by mods
•	Several pre set sort options
•	Several pre set filter options, some detailed filter settings and fully customizable filtering using the Excel auto filter functionality
•	Simple one click clear function for setting up for a new game or profile

I do not guarentee total accuracy though I think it is pretty darn close and I do not guarentee there are no items missing but if there are I think not many. If you do know of anything inaccurate or missing please let me know.

If you like it and find it of use that\'s great - if not that\'s cool too - we are all different and while it matches the game experience I want you might just think \"what a heap of garbage\". It was built for me and if no one ever uses it that is fine, it still served its purpose but I figured I may as well put it out there just in case it was of use to anyone else.

If you do happen to be at all interested watch for more - there will be additions for Locations, Quests, Ingredients & Recipes, Shouts and more - if it can be tracked I will be adding it in due course.
author: TheGrumpyOldLimey
